completed_steps.summary: Found 21 existing docs, user wants BMAD artifacts included
Tech stack: Effect-ts + LangGraph backend, React 19 + TanStack Start frontend, Drizzle + PostgreSQL DB
Deep scan completed: 5 parallel agents scanned API/backend, frontend/UI, domain/infra, CI/CD, and BMAD artifacts
Generated project-overview.md - executive summary, architecture, tech stack, deployment
Generated source-tree-analysis.md - full annotated directory tree, critical folders, entry points, integration points
Generated data-models.md - 8 PostgreSQL tables, ER diagram, DDL, indexes, Redis keys, migration strategy
Generated api-reference.md - 14 endpoints (10 Effect + 4 Better Auth), error types, CORS config
Generated index.md - master documentation index with project overview, data models, epic roadmap, navigation
Existing docs (ARCHITECTURE.md, COMMANDS.md, DEPLOYMENT.md, FRONTEND.md, etc.) already comprehensive - no additional generation needed
Validation passed: no incomplete markers, no TODOs, no placeholders found in generated docs
Workflow finalized - 5 new documents generated, 21 existing docs preserved
